name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - C.O.D.E. Warriors Personalization Pack
detailed_description:
The Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warriors Personalization Pack includes an exclusive weapon skin, three reticles and an all-new C.O.D.E. Warriors Calling Card.

When you purchase the C.O.D.E. Warriors Pack, you’re helping Veterans find meaningful employment after leaving service. 100% of all Activision proceeds of the C.O.D.E. Warriors Pack will go directly to help combat Veteran unemployment.

Visit http://www.callofdutyendowment.org to learn more.

fullgame.name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom™ II X4 810 @ 2.60 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
